resources.string: By logging in, I agree to the Privacy Policy for Rakuten Group, Inc. and Rakuten Mobile, Inc. as the following link.
my Rakuten Mobile is not installed on this device. Would you like to open Google Play Store？

Sign in with your Rakuten Mobile phone number

resources.string: This is the beginning of your message history with %s
Make or receive a new call and it will appear here
You can\'t send messages to this group because you\'re no longer a participant.
You can only pin up to 5 message rooms
Select a file with size less than 60MB
Select a video with size less than 50MB
Some files are not selected due to file size limit
Some files are not selected due to file size limit or invalid file format
This message could not be sent since it is too long. Would you like to send this as a file?
Please Enable your location in order to share your current location
Sending media is not available for non link users
You\'re no longer a participant in this group
You can only share with up to %1$d message rooms

Are you sure you want to mute notifications from "%1$s"?

Receive a voicemail and it will appear here

Please login into connect app to use this feature
I am using GlobalMeet UC as my unified communications app and I think you\'d find it useful for messaging, calling and meeting. Check it out - http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=%1$s
Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?

Are you sure you want to clear all messages and shared content between you and "%1$s"?

Selected contacts will be deleted from Rakuten Link.

Send new message from bottom right icon!
Synchronize your devices address book to Rakuten Link
Allow access to contacts from the device settings.
To assist with your support call, here is your information.
Call and message anyone with ease
This contact will be deleted from Rakuten Link and device’s address book.
This contact will be deleted from Rakuten Link.
Unable to connect to the server. Please try after a while.
Touch and hold the contact in \"Contacts\" and add to favorite!
%1$d Message rooms will be deleted, Once you deleted the group message you will not receive any message on that group
This action can\'t be undone. Are you sure you want to set the default greeting?
No Application found to handle this action.
Voice Mail has been deleted successfully
Voice Mails have been deleted successfully
By signing in, I agree to the Terms & Services and consent to the processing of my data as described in the Privacy Policy
By signing in, I agree to the Terms & Services and consent to the processing of my data as described in the Privacy Policy
Tell us what didn’t work well?
Contact details do not display well
Thank you for your feedback. We will refer your feedback for the future improvement.
Thank you for your valuable feedback.
it helps us to improve Rakuten Link
We will refer to your feedback for future improvement.
How would you rate the quality of the Voice Call?
How would you rate the quality of the Video Call (BETA)?
How would you rate Link Message?
How would you rate the quality of the Voice Mail?
Can\'t create the message room. Please retry later.
Can\'t create the group. Please retry later.
You\'re no longer a participant in this group
Unable to change the subject because you aren\'t a participant
Unable to update the group icon because you aren\'t a participant
Unable to add the participants because you aren\'t a participant
You can\'t add more than 100 participants
This is long message, it will go as file, if you want to continue please click on Yes
Invite friends to Rakuten Link to \nenjoy free messages and video calls
Align the barcode with the square
Are you sure you want to exit the group?
Join me on Rakuten Link and enjoy free messages & HD video, voice calls. Check out the Rakuten Link app now\n https://play.google.com/apps/testing/jp.co.rakuten.mobile.rcs
This call cannot be placed without a VoLTE network signal. Please make sure you have a network signal to proceed
%s is requesting to switch to video call
Tap on mic and start recording
Tap on mic and stop recording
This will discard any recording you have made.
Requesting to switch to video call
Sorry! I can’t talk right now.
This call cannot be initiated as there is an ongoing call already.
To make or continue call, LINK need permissions
Failed to initiate the call. Please check your network connection and try again.
Please make another participant as admin for %s
Can\'t send selected document to %1$s\nCorrupted File Format
Can\'t send %1$d documents - Corrupted File Format\nSend remaining documents to %2$s ?
Can\'t send selected documents to %1$s - Corrupted File Format
Please reset default dialer app before logout.
Are you sure you want to delete selected message room? You will lose all shared contents
Are you sure you want to delete selected message room(s)? You will lose all shared contents
To Record a Voice Message allow Link to access your microphone.
Do you want to turn off the Link location access?
Allow Link app to access your current location.
To share media allow link to access photo,media and files.
To download media, allow Link access to your device\'s photos, media and files. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Storage on.
To view media, allow Link access to your device\'s photos, media and files. Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Storage on.
Allow access to take pictures and record videos from the device settings
To scan QR code, allow Link to access your camera
Allow access to photos, media and files on your device from the device settings
Allow access to this device\'s location from the device settings
Allow access to contacts on your device from the device settings
Allow access to make and manage phone calls from the device settings
Allow access to record audio from the device settings
To show call bubble over other apps, please allow permission from device settings
photos, media and files on your device
Allow access to %s from the device settings.
Allow access to %s and %s from the device settings.
Allow access to %s, %s and %s from the device settings.
To take a photo or a video
To set a photo for group message
%s, allow Link to access your %s and %s
%s, allow Link to access your %s, %s and %s
To take a photo or a video
Are you sure you want to delete selected message(s)?
No application is installed to handle this file type.
Are you sure you want to logout?
Please logout before uninstall, otherwise you may not receive calls and SMSs on your phone.
This number is not in your contact list.
Number %1$s is already present in some other contact.
If you would like to discontinue using Rakuten Link, please logout before you uninstall the application. \n\nIf you uninstalled app without logout, you may not receive calls and SMSs on your phone.
You have been logged out because a new SIM card was detected. Rakuten Link can only be used with a Rakuten Mobile SIM card. Please try again after inserting your SIM card.
when turning off, functions which are related location are disabled.
You cannot use services that require your device\'s location if this setting is disabled
Allow sharing of usage data to help improve services and provide more relevant targeting of advertising.
Allow sharing of usage data to help improve services and provide more relevant targeting of advertising.
Do you want to turn on Link Usage Data?
Do you want to turn off Link Usage Data?
Do you want to turn off Link location access?\nAppInfo >Permission >Location >Turn off the button

b.u: 快適なサービスをご利用いただくための情報提供について

resources.string: No Internet connection, please try later
We are unable to authenticate you at this time. Please try again later. If the issue persists please press More Details below.
We are unable to authenticate your phone number as it is not mapped to your Rakuten ID. Please input correct Rakuten Mobile phone number.
We are unable to authenticate you now as multiple attempts were tried to login with this number earlier. Please try again after some time
We are unable to authenticate you now as multiple attempts were tried to login with this number earlier. Please try again after %s

Access to your device\'s microphone is required to allow you to make phone calls and send voice messages. Please click \"Allow\" when prompted to provide access. \n\n *Your conversation will not be recorded
Access to your device\'s microphone is required to allow you to make phone calls and send voice messages.
You have already logged in on another desktop device, do you want to login on this device instead? You will be logged out from the other device automatically.
Access to Phone permission is required to make Link phone calls
Access to Camera permission is required to make Link video calls
Tap to record your personal greeting message
You are on a good network
You are on a average network
You are on a poor network
Session expired. Please input the new OTP manually
Server is unavailable. Please try it again later.
Please update the app and retry.
Restarting conversation due to unexpected error.
Unexpected error occurred. Please try it again later.
Get access to customer support by tapping the icon at the bottom right

. Please make sure you are connected to Rakuten or partner Mobile network using a recommended Rakuten Mobile device

Call will be placed from native phone app. Charges may apply based on the phone number. More details
